India's First GenAI-Powered Design Thinking CBSE School (Patented)

Your Pathway to Stanford

Trained by Stanford Alumni, our students learn world-class Design Thinking Methodologies and innovation practices that open doors to elite universities worldwide.

Transform your child into a confident learner and global leader at Coimbatore's most progressive CBSE school.

Why Parents Choose SNS Academy

We don't just teach subjects—we redesign common minds through design thinking, preparing your child for tomorrow's challenges.

Design Thinking Education

India's first school with GenAI-Powered Design Thinking Framework (Patented). Built on Empathy, every child learns to solve problems creatively using AI-enhanced methodologies from an early age.

3P Culture Framework

Purpose, Process, People—our holistic approach ensures every child develops academically, socially, emotionally, and ethically.

10:1 Personalized Care

Ultra-low student-teacher ratio ensures every child receives individual attention. 60% of our faculty have 10+ years of experience.

SNS Innovation Hub

Access to SNS iHub—India's Y-Combinator equivalent. Students work with AI, IoT, Robotics, AR/VR labs preparing them for future careers.

World-Class SPINE Center

5-level activity center with swimming pool, indoor cricket, gym, music studio, dance studio, theater, and more—everything under one roof.

5 Pillars Development

Learning, Upskilling, Innovation, Networking, Character Building—comprehensive development for future leaders.

Academic Excellence at Every Level

CBSE curriculum enhanced with design thinking, experiential learning, and innovation from Nursery to Grade XII.

Pre-Primary

Nursery - UKG

Play-based learning with early literacy, numeracy, and social development.

Primary

Grades 1 - 5

Conceptual understanding, creativity, and skill development with hands-on learning.

Middle School

Grades 6 - 8

Critical thinking, problem-solving, and project-based collaborative learning.

Secondary & Senior Secondary

Grades 9 - 12

Board exam excellence with career pathways and university preparation.

What Parents Say About Us

Hear from the parents who trust SNS Academy with their children's future

She's not just scoring well academically but also developing real-world skills. The personalized attention with 10:1 ratio is truly commendable."

Verified Parent Review

The school's emphasis on both academics and innovation through SNS iHub is preparing him for future challenges. Highly recommend for parents seeking holistic development."

My daughter loves the fingerprint approach where her unique talents are recognized and nurtured. The teachers are experienced and truly dedicated."

Verified Parent Review

pages.academics-pre-primary:
Pre-Primary Education

Nursery, LKG & UKG (Ages 2.5 - 5 years)

Building strong foundations through play-based learning, curiosity, and early childhood development.

Our Pre-Primary Philosophy

Every parent appreciates that these early years in education are a time of curiosity, discovery, and learning. Our Preschool curriculum is inquiry and play-based, with a strong focus on developing early Literacy and Numeracy skills.

Great emphasis is placed on developing early reading and writing skills, so that each child is given a "head start" in their education. The wonderful world of stories, nursery rhymes, songs, role-play, and drama within a language-rich learning environment stimulates children's curiosity.

Program Highlights

  • Hands-on, fun, and exciting curriculum designed by EZ Vidya Chrysalis
  • Play-based learning with structured activities
  • Development of communication and language skills
  • Focus on gross and fine motor skills
  • Building positive self-sense and relationships

Our Pre-Primary Programs

Nursery (2.5-3.5 years)

Our youngest students enjoy a hands-on, fun curriculum with opportunities to think, speak, and listen in various situations.

  • • Communication & language development
  • • Indoor & outdoor learning
  • • Motor skills development
  • • Stories, rhymes & songs

Lower KG (3.5-4.5 years)

More structured day with emphasis on early English and Mathematics skills, while maintaining a balanced program.

  • • Phonics & early reading
  • • Basic mathematics concepts
  • • Creative arts & design
  • • Technology introduction

Upper KG (4.5-5.5 years)

Preparing for formal schooling with advanced literacy and numeracy skills, critical thinking, and creativity.

  • • Blending & segmentation
  • • Early writing skills
  • • Problem-solving activities
  • • School readiness preparation

Literacy Programme

We place great emphasis on developing early Literacy skills to provide your child with a 'head start' in their education. Through well-established literacy programmes, children are taught fundamental skills essential for early reading and writing success.

  • Fun and interactive introduction to alphabetic sounds and phonics
  • Letter recognition and sound association
  • Early reading and writing development
  • Storytelling and comprehension skills

Numeracy Programme

Our Numeracy programme draws on the young child's natural mathematical interest and encourages numerical proficiency. Children participate in meaningful and fun activities that build their initial understanding.

  • Number recognition and counting
  • Shapes, patterns, and spatial awareness
  • Real-life mathematical experiences
  • Problem-solving through games

Give Your Child the Best Start

Join SNS Academy's Pre-Primary program and watch your child thrive.

Apply for Admission Schedule Visit
pages.academics-primary:
Primary Education

Grades 1 - 5 (Ages 6-10 years)

Building strong educational foundations through balanced exploratory learning and explicit teaching of core knowledge and skills.

CBSE Curriculum with Innovation

SNS Academy follows CBSE Curriculum enhanced with design thinking methodologies. Core English and Mathematics skills are explicitly taught from foundation, while the broader skills of Literacy and Numeracy are developed across all subject areas.

All classrooms are equipped with smart boards which are used regularly to facilitate learning, making education interactive and engaging.

Our Goals

  • Equip children with knowledge, skills, and values for a globalized world
  • Develop successful learners and creative individuals
  • Foster strong sense of community and social justice
  • Encourage critical and creative thinking

Primary School Journey

1-2

Grade 1 & 2 Learners

First years of formal schooling

Students participate in play-based learning programmes that involve activities designed to develop comprehensive skills. The rigorous CBSE curriculum is flexible and suits children from a wide range of educational backgrounds.

  • • Foundational literacy and numeracy
  • • Interactive learning with smart boards
  • • Creative expression through arts
  • • Physical education and sports

Teachers develop teaching programmes that build on students' interests, strengths, and goals, addressing cognitive, affective, physical, social, and aesthetic needs.

  • • Inquiry-based learning
  • • Social skills development
  • • Introduction to technology
  • • Field trips and excursions
3-4

Grade 3 & 4 Learners

Building confidence and independence

Beyond Classroom

Field trips and excursions for real-world learning experiences

Presentations

Opportunities in class meetings, assemblies, and large forums

Leadership

Student Representative Council participation

5-6

Grade 5 & 6 Learners

Preparing for middle school excellence

Grades 5 and 6 are laden with new learning opportunities. Students continue to grow and flourish in their academic and extra-curricular pursuits with guidance and encouragement from class teachers and subject specialists.

  • Motivated to extend academic abilities
  • Sporting and cultural development
  • Self-discipline and courtesy expectations
  • Positions of responsibility and leadership
  • Representing school with pride
  • Utilizing unique skills and talents

Nurture Your Child's Potential

Experience world-class primary education with design thinking approach.

Apply for Admission Schedule Visit
pages.academics-middle:
Middle School Education

Grades 6 - 8 (Ages 11-13 years)

Developing critical thinking, problem-solving, and collaborative skills through project-based learning and design thinking.

Building Stage Curriculum

Middle school at SNS Academy focuses on the Building Stage, where students master the design thinking framework and begin applying it to real-world challenges. This critical phase prepares students for advanced academic pursuits and develops entrepreneurial mindsets.

Our curriculum combines rigorous CBSE academics with hands-on projects, critical reasoning, and collaborative problem-solving, ensuring students develop both knowledge and practical skills.

Key Focus Areas

  • Design Thinking Framework Mastery
  • Critical Thinking & Problem Solving
  • Real-World Problem Solving Projects
  • Team Collaboration & Communication
  • Research Skills & Data Analysis

Subject Areas & Learning Approach

Core Academics

  • • Mathematics & Science
  • • English Language & Literature
  • • Social Studies & History
  • • Hindi/Tamil Languages

Innovation & Design

  • • Design Thinking Projects
  • • STEM & Robotics
  • • Innovation Lab Activities
  • • Prototype Development

Life Skills

  • • Leadership & Communication
  • • Collaboration & Teamwork
  • • Time Management
  • • Digital Literacy

Design Thinking in Middle School

Students apply the complete design thinking cycle to solve real community and environmental challenges.

Empathize

User research & interviews

Define

Problem framing

Ideate

Brainstorm solutions

Prototype

Build & iterate

Test

Validate & refine

What Makes Our Middle School Unique

Project-Based Learning

Students work on interdisciplinary projects that integrate multiple subjects and apply learning to real-world situations. Each project follows the design thinking process from problem identification to solution testing.

  • • Community Impact Projects
  • • Science & Technology Innovations
  • • Social Entrepreneurship Challenges

Innovation Labs

Access to state-of-the-art facilities including robotics lab, makerspaces, and digital learning tools that enable hands-on experimentation and creativity.

  • • Robotics & Coding
  • • 3D Design & Printing
  • • IoT & Electronics Projects

Personalized Support

Small class sizes with 10:1 student-teacher ratio ensure individualized attention and support for each student's unique learning journey.

  • • Dedicated Mentors
  • • Regular Progress Reviews
  • • Parent-Teacher Collaboration

Global Exposure

Preparing students for a connected world through international collaborations, competitions, and exposure to global perspectives.

  • • Virtual Exchange Programs
  • • National/International Competitions
  • • Cultural Awareness Programs

Join Our Middle School Community

Give your child the opportunity to develop critical thinking, creativity, and problem-solving skills in a nurturing environment.

Apply for Admission Schedule Visit
pages.facilities:
World-Class Facilities

Everything your child needs for holistic development under one roof—SPINE Activity Center and beyond.

SNS SPINE Activity Center

A 5-level world-class activity center for sports, arts, entertainment, and wellness. Unlock your SPINE at SNS!

Swimming Pool

Professional-grade swimming pool with trained coaches. Swimming regularly lowers stress, reduces anxiety and depression, and improves sleep patterns.

Indoor Cricket Center

All-weather cricket pitch with bowling machine and 3 nets. Play with proper lighting even at night, in any weather. Quality coaching for all skill levels.

Fitness Center

Fully-equipped gym with treadmill, multi-station equipment, strength machines, weights, and boxing kits. Stay toned and healthy!

Music Studio

Professional music studio with extensive collection of beats, loops, and instruments. Connect your own instrument and create!

Beats Dance Studio

Dance classes for all styles—social dances, performances, and fitness. Enrich your life through movement and expression.

Art Room

Creative space for drawing, painting, and artistic expression. Render concepts, thoughts, emotions, and fantasies in visual form.

Bioskop Theater

Compact digital theater with large wall projection and superior sound effects. Experience movies differently with on-site parking.

Gaming Arena

State-of-the-art gaming space for recreational and competitive online gaming. Modern setup for esports and entertainment.

Rooftop Restaurant

Fine dining experience on the rooftop with light bites and seasonal sips. Perfect for spending time with loved ones.

Buttlefield Lounge

Connective lounge with library, billiards, snooker, home theater, and Apple desktop. Comfy accommodation for action-packed breaks!

Academic Infrastructure

Smart Classrooms

Interactive smart boards in every classroom

Science Labs

Well-equipped Physics, Chemistry, Biology labs

Computer Labs

Modern computers with latest software

Library

Extensive collection of books and resources

Experience Our Facilities

Schedule a campus visit to see our world-class infrastructure.

Schedule Campus Tour
pages.innovation:
SNS Innovation Hub

Powered by India's First Patented GenAI Design Thinking Framework | India's Y-Combinator for Schools

About SNS iHub

SNS iHub is an initiative by SNS Institutions to foster startups by providing a prototyping space immersed in an ambience of creativity and our patented GenAI-powered Design Thinking framework.

The center helps identify societal/industrial needs and solve them using our AI-enhanced design thinking approach, mentored by experts from academia and industry.

RADICAL Technologies

  • Robotics & Automation
  • AR/VR Technology
  • Data Science/AI/ML
  • IoT/Cybersecurity
  • Communication Tech
  • Additive Manufacturing
  • Low Code/No Code

SHAAARP Industry Verticals

pages.about:
About SNS Academy

Redesigning Common Minds & Business Since 2014

Our Vision

Building an Entrepreneurial Mindset Through Our GenAI-Powered Design Thinking Framework (Patented)

Our Tagline

Redesigning Common Minds & Business Towards Excellence

Core Values

Sincerity, Nobility, Service

5 Pillars Mission

Our comprehensive mission built on five foundational pillars

1. Learning & Teaching

Practice Design Thinking-Based Academic Learning & Teaching

2. Skill & Career Development

Build life skills through various clubs and contests

3. Centre for Creativity

Hands-on experience solving key industrial problems with latest technologies

4. Industry Partnership

Connect with industries and learn business sense

5. Social Responsibility

Give back to society through social service initiatives

3P Culture Framework

Purpose, Process, People - Our holistic approach to education

Purpose

Clear vision and goals for every learning experience. Understanding the 'why' behind education.

Process

Design thinking methodologies and systematic approaches to learning and problem-solving.

People

Collaborative learning environment with strong teacher-student-parent partnerships.

3C Competency Circle

Building well-rounded individuals through comprehensive skill development

Attitude

  • Curiosity: Fostering inquisitive minds that question and explore
  • Accountability: Taking ownership of actions and learning

Logical & Business Skills

  • Critical thinking and problem-solving
  • Business acumen and entrepreneurial mindset
  • Decision-making and analytical abilities

Technical Skills

  • RADICAL Technologies (AI, IoT, Robotics, AR/VR)
  • Coding and computational thinking
  • Design thinking and innovation tools

Our Leadership

Meet the visionary leaders who guide SNS Academy towards excellence

DS

Deiva Thiru Dr. S.N. Subbramanian

Founder Chairman, SNS Group

Design Thinker

"As Founder Chairman, it brings me immense joy to welcome you to SNS Academy, India's first Design Thinking CBSE school. Our vision is to nurture young minds from Nursery to Grade XII with world-class education."

"We believe that every child is a design thinker. Through our unique Design Thinking framework and 3P Culture, we prepare students not just for exams, but for life—fostering curiosity, creativity, and confidence in every learner."

DR

Dr. S. Rajalakshmi

Chairman / Correspondent, SNS Group

Design Thinker

"At SNS Academy, we believe that early education shapes future leaders. Our CBSE-affiliated curriculum, combined with Stanford-trained Design Thinking methodologies, provides children with a strong foundation for academic and personal excellence."

"We focus on holistic development through our 5 Pillars Mission—Learning, Skill Development, Creativity, Industry Partnership, and Social Responsibility. Our experienced faculty nurtures each child's unique potential, preparing them for global opportunities."

NS

Nalin SNS

Technical Director, SNS Group

Design Thinker & Evangelist

"At SNS Institutions, we believe that success comes from a relentless focus on initiative, innovation and execution. As visionary leaders, we aim to build 1000 AI startups in 10 years using our Agentic/GenAI powered framework."

"Through our 3P Culture (Purpose, Process, People) and 5 Pillars framework, we're building entrepreneurial mindsets using design thinking methodologies. SNS iHub serves as India's Y-Combinator, focused on SHAAARP industries and RADICAL technologies."

pages.admissions:
Admissions 2026-27

Begin Your Child's Journey to Excellence

Admission Process

1

Register

Visit school on any working day between 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM and register for your child's admission.

2

Assessment

Written assessment in English, Mathematics, Language, and General Knowledge according to School's syllabi.

3

Interview

Interview to determine alignment of parental views with school philosophy and interpret student scores.

4

Selection

Results compiled on merit by Admissions Committee. Seats offered in order of merit.

Admission Inquiry Form

School Transport Services

Safety Features

Speed Governor

All buses fitted with speed limiters for safety

GPS Tracking

Real-time location monitoring system

RFID System

Smart cards for secure boarding

First Aid Box

Fully equipped medical kit in every bus

Trained Staff

Caretakers on every bus for student safety

CCTV Cameras

Video surveillance for complete security

Transport Guidelines

Important information for parents

For Parents

  • Punctuality: Students must report 5 minutes before bus arrival
  • Pick-up (Nursery-VII): Parents must receive child at bus stop
  • Changes: Route/stop changes require 1 month advance notice
  • Communication: All requests via official email only

For Students

  • Uniform: Proper school uniform mandatory
  • ID Card: School ID with bus number required
  • Prohibited: Eating, drinking, or games in bus
  • Behavior: Maintain discipline; misbehavior may cancel service

School Timings

Buses are scheduled to ensure students arrive by 8:15 AM daily

Routes are designed to minimize transit time and provide comfortable journeys

Get Route Schedule

Need Transport Information?

Contact our transport coordinator for route details, availability, and fees

pages.stanford-pathway:
Elite University Preparation

Your Pathway to Stanford

Trained by Stanford Alumni, we equip students with our patented GenAI-powered Design Thinking framework, world-class methodologies, innovation practices, and the mindset to excel at elite universities worldwide.

Stanford-Trained Faculty

Our educators have been directly trained by Stanford University alumni in design thinking, innovation, and entrepreneurial mindset development.

Design Thinking

Stanford's proven 5-stage design thinking process: Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, Test

Innovation Labs

Hands-on projects using Stanford's d.school methodology for creative problem-solving

Entrepreneurship

Stanford-style startup thinking and lean methodology for young innovators

The Stanford Pathway Roadmap

A structured 12-year journey from Nursery to Grade XII, building the foundation for elite university admission

1 Foundation Stage (Nursery - Grade 5)

Learning Objectives

  • Curiosity & Wonder Development
  • Creative Thinking & Exploration
  • Basic Problem-Solving Skills
  • Collaboration & Communication

Key Methods

  • Project-Based Learning
  • Storytelling & Creative Arts
  • Hands-On STEM Activities
  • Group Projects & Peer Learning

2 Building Stage (Grades 6 - 8)

Learning Objectives

  • Design Thinking Framework Mastery
  • Critical Thinking & Analysis
  • Innovation & Ideation
  • Leadership & Teamwork

Key Methods

  • Stanford Design Challenges
  • Innovation Labs & Prototyping
  • Hackathons & Competitions
  • Student-Led Projects

3 Excellence Stage (Grades 9 - 12)

Learning Objectives

  • Advanced Research & Innovation
  • Entrepreneurial Mindset & Startup Skills
  • Global Competency & Cultural Awareness
  • College Application & Essay Excellence
  • Personal Branding & Portfolio Development

Key Methods

  • Real-World Startup Projects & Incubation
  • Research Papers, Patents & Publications
  • SAT/TOEFL Coaching & Standardized Test Prep
  • College Counseling & Application Support
  • National/International Competition Participation
  • Alumni Mentorship from Elite Universities

OKRs (Objectives & Key Results)

We use Stanford-style goal-setting frameworks to track student progress and ensure excellence

Academic Excellence

CBSE Board Performance & Subject Mastery

95%+

Target Score

Innovation Projects

Real-World Problem-Solving Initiatives

5+

Per Student/Year

Competitions

National/International Participation

Per Student/Year

Leadership

Student Council & Club Leadership Roles

100%

Participation Rate

Design Thinking Playbook

Our comprehensive guide and roadmap for implementing Stanford-style design thinking from Nursery to Grade XII

Stage 1: Empathize

Understanding users through observation, interviews, and immersion

  • User interviews & shadowing
  • Empathy mapping exercises
  • Journey mapping workshops

Stage 2: Define

Framing the problem and identifying key insights

  • Point of view (POV) statements
  • "How Might We" questions
  • Problem definition frameworks

Stage 3: Ideate

Generating creative solutions through brainstorming

  • Brainstorming sessions
  • SCAMPER technique
  • Mind mapping & sketching

Stage 4: Prototype

Building quick, low-fidelity versions to explore ideas

  • Paper prototypes & wireframes
  • 3D printing & maker labs
  • Digital mockups & simulations

Stage 5: Test

Gathering feedback and iterating on solutions

  • User testing sessions
  • Feedback collection & analysis
  • Iterative refinement cycles
  • Final presentation & showcase

Business Model Canvas (BMC)

A simple visual framework with 9 key components to build entrepreneurial thinking

1. Key Partners

Who are our partners & suppliers?

2. Key Activities

What do we do?

3. Key Resources

What do we need?

4. Value
Propositions

What value do we deliver? Why do customers choose us?

5. Customer
Relationships

How do we interact?

6. Channels

How do we reach customers?

7. Customer Segments

Who are we creating value for? Who are our most important customers?

8. Cost Structure

What are the main costs? What resources and activities are most expensive?

9. Revenue Streams

How do we make money? What value are customers willing to pay for?

Request our comprehensive Design Thinking Playbook with lesson plans, worksheets, and project templates for all grade levels

pages.academics-secondary:
Secondary & Senior Secondary Education

Grades 9 - 12 (Ages 14-18 years)

Excellence Stage: Preparing students for board examinations, elite universities, and future success through academic rigor and innovation.

Excellence Stage Curriculum

Grades 9-12 focus on academic excellence, board exam preparation, and university readiness. Students receive comprehensive support for CBSE board exams (X & XII), competitive entrance exams, and international university applications.

Our GenAI-powered design thinking framework continues to guide students through advanced research, innovation projects, and entrepreneurial ventures while building strong academic foundations.

Excellence Stage Objectives

  • Board Exam Excellence (CBSE X & XII)
  • University Application Preparation
  • Advanced Research & Innovation
  • Entrepreneurial Skills Development
  • SAT/TOEFL Coaching & Test Prep

Choose Your Stream (Grades 11-12)

Specialized pathways for your future career

Science Stream

Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics/Biology with Computer Science

  • • Engineering preparation
  • • Medical entrance coaching
  • • Research opportunities
  • • Lab-intensive learning

Commerce Stream

Accountancy, Business Studies, Economics with Mathematics

  • • CA/CS preparation
  • • Business management
  • • Financial literacy
  • • Startup incubation

Humanities Stream

History, Political Science, Economics, Psychology

  • • Civil services preparation
  • • Law entrance coaching
  • • Social sciences research
  • • Critical thinking skills
